main event: An unidentified flying object was observed by military personnel 5 miles southeast of Manila, Philippines on November 5, 1954.
interesting points: The object was first observed at an altitude of approximately 15,000 feet.,The object displayed varying colors, changing from white to orange and back.,It was reported moving in a northeasterly direction at a speed estimated between 300 and 500 knots.,The object was generally circular in shape and varied in size during observation.,The sighting lasted for approximately 5 to 7 minutes before the object vanished.
witness description: one officer and one enlisted man assigned to the 3rd Radar Plotting and Control Unit
